The financial problem has received the special attention of the Treasurer,'the honourable member for 'Hume; the honourable member for Mernda, the honourable member for Darwin,' the honourable member for North Sydney, the honourable member for Flinders, and the honourable member for Kooyong, who, with the honoiable member for South Sydney, and the - honourable member for Wide Bay, have propounded schemes for its solution. The Constitution Bill, as submitted to the first referendum, contained a provision that the Commonwealth should for all time return to the States three-fourths of its Customs and Excise revenue.
